website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, the style of this vase and its alternate style is worth a look if you like ceramics with a classic, fired glaze appearance. However, be prepared for the colors to look different in person than on your screen.
pros: Boasts a glazed finish with varying patterns that make each vase unique
Choose from a short, rounded design that stands 5.3 inches, or a tall version that's 12 inches in height
cons: Colors aren't very bright in person, and are actually on the dull side
Short vase isn't ideal if you prefer long-stemmed flower arrangements

customer_reviews.title: nice size. The colors are definitely not as vibrant ...
customer_reviews.text: It a cute piece, nice size. The colors are definitely not as vibrant as the picture and some angles are better than others. Overall I like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors in photo more bold and looks more expensive then in person but works for my grouping .
customer_reviews.text: Nice vase I would say the photo is more bold colors and looks more expensive then in person . It fits with the grouping of objects inside is white and looks a bit unfinished. Mine in kitchen and can see the white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of mine was not green, was gray, but still looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Its drab and coloring does not add anything to the flowers or as a stand alone
customer_reviews.text: Looks drab and boring The vase is the right measurement but does not look attractive when you open it. Infact it looks very colorless and drab instead of appearing vibrant and lacks shine and presence..
customer_reviews.author: Garima Bhatnagar

customer_reviews.title: It will work for what I wanted but disappointed in the dull colors
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape are exactly what I wanted. The colors are much more dull than in the picture which was very disappointing but in fairness, the other reviewers already noted that as an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christianne Karsten

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the reviewers before me stated, the color is not as bright as seen in the advertised photo but it is still soooooooo very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Rush_Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought these vases for friends and they loved them! Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice year-round decor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors! Goes well with our decor, fits long-stemmed flowers well.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya G Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is stunning. I also ordered the shorter piece to go with it and I can't wait for it to arrive. It is the perfect compliment to a picture I have above my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Great vase
customer_reviews.text: Great vase! The colors are really nice and it was packed well. Looks great in my room!
customer_reviews.author: R. Steebs

customer_reviews.title: A visually striking piece, very well-made
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather striking piece. We really like the colors and its sort of blending style. Opening rim is smooth, without flaw. The rest of the visible part is also smooth and finish is rich and consistent. No maker's mark on the bottom, and as should be expected, it's raw ceramic so it will need a felt or cork pad under it for most surfaces. It feels thick and solid, very well-made. Very happy with it. Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - many things you buy every day will generate a small donation to the charity of your choice. Read about it here:
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: Soft blue and green colored vase
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful vase in soft blue and green colors. It has a small opening and only 1-3 stems of flowers can fit in. I would recommend long stems because it would bring up the beauty of both vase and the flower itself. Vase makes a really nice decorative piece and it can fit nicely in any kind of decorum. Vase itself is not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Ok, small
customer_reviews.text: Very small, very common. Nice gift but the glaze is nothing special. A mass produced vase that passes, but does not impress me as something special. A felt bottom would have been a touch of class, but that is missing, I will have to visit the hardware store. It is just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Foxboy

customer_reviews.title: Unique color design and beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vase. each one is unique and mine doesn't have the same color variation, particularly in the middle, as the one in the photo on the product page, but it is lovely just the same. The small opening makes it perfect for oil diffusion, dried flowers, or just on its own. I've got it in a guest bathroom and it is complemented nicely by the fixtures I have. It is fairly heavy for its size and has a sturdy base. It won't tip over. It looks to be well made and the finish is smooth and slightly shiny. It's a very nice addition to my home décor.
customer_reviews.author: W. Simpsen

customer_reviews.title: attractive and colorful
customer_reviews.text: This tiny vase is quite attractive and colorful. The finish is smooth and shiny. As noted, the vase is only about 5" tall. Think of it as being the size of an oversized christmas ornament. That limits you to a fairly small display area. We put this on a tall shelf and it looked all wrong. We ended up placing it on an end table next to a picture frame and the scale was a good fit. I really like the pop of color that this adds to the room.
customer_reviews.author: J. York

customer_reviews.title: Drab, lacking color...not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I collect ceramic vases, and when Amazon offered to send this to me for review, I was pretty excited to see these brilliant colors. I was disappointed. My vase is dull and lacks the brilliant blues as advertised. It is well made, and the size is correct, but the colors aren't what I expected. The blues are waaaay down at the bottom of the vase, and the grey is just well--grey and drab. It's an okay vase...but not great.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand – Rivet Mid Century Modern Round Ceramic Home Decor Flower Vase - 5 Inch, Blue and Green
product_meta.description: Style:WideVarying shades of green and blue accentuate this ceramic vase, which acts as a lovely display piece with or without cut flowers. Each is fired with reactive glaze, so no two are alike. This vase will add refreshing color to any style room.
feature_bullets: Varying shades of green and blue accentuate this ceramic vase, which acts as a lovely display piece with or without cut flowers. Each is fired with reactive glaze, so no two are alike. This vase will add refreshing color to any style room.
Fired with reactive glaze; allow for variations in pattern and color

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
